constructor-arg.value: select * from t_so_payWarnningLog where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)

select * from t_so_payWarnningLog where
lifecycle !=2
#if($orderCode) and ORDERCODE=:orderCode #end
#if($thirPayNo) and THIRPAYNO=:thirPayNo #end
#if($version) and VERSION >= :versionStart #end #if($version) and VERSION <= :versionEnd #end

#if($paystate_payment) and PAYSTATE_PAYMENT=:paystate_payment #end
#if($isSupportQuery) and ISSUPPORTQUERY=:isSupportQuery #end
#if($result) and RESULT=:result #end #if($lifecycle) and lifecycle =:lifecycle #end
update t_so_payWarnningLog set lifecycle=:state where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)
update t_so_payWarnningLog set lifecycle=2 where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)
